posts.title: Middle Finger Mug
posts.content: Surprise your co-workers with the middle finger when you sneak this offensive coffee cup into the break room cup cabinet. Disguised as an every day white ceramic mug, the interior contains a little surprise that pops up to say hello after the coffee is all gone.

posts.title: Jackery 240Wh Portable Power Station
posts.content: The Jackery Explorer 240 is the 240-watt capacity power station that will keep your campsite running without weighing you down. Coming in at under 7 lbs, it features 2 USB Outputs, an AC outlet, and a car port with surge and short circuit protection.

posts.title: Retro Apple Watch Docking Station
posts.content: Give your high-tech watch some old school flair using this retro Apple watch docking station. You simply side your Apple watch inside the designated slot to conveniently charge it while giving your watch a vintage Macintosh display.

posts.title: World’s Okayest Mom Coffee Mug
posts.content: You may not be the greatest mom in the world, but at least none of your kids ended up in prison or on the pole. The “World’s Okayest Mom” coffee mug celebrates your respectably average and laissez-faire style of parenting that certainly could’ve been worse.

posts.title: UV Digital Bill Counter
posts.content: When you require utmost reliability and efficiency to count your fat stacks, this UV digital bill counter is just the tool for the job. It features a quality steel construction, comes with built-in ultraviolet counterfeit detection, and can count 1,300 bills per minute.

posts.title: 7x7x7 Rubik’s Cube
posts.content: When the standard Rubik’s Cube becomes child’s play, try the 7x7x7 Rubik’s Cube instead. This monster size cube features a slew of extra rows designed to exponentially increase the difficulty and really have you flex those brain muscles.

posts.title: Bullet Earbuds
posts.content: To truly appreciate your music, you need well calibrated instruments of destruction – such as these bullet earbuds. These precision headphones are shaped like 9mm bullets and feature silicone hollow points with noise cancelling technology.

posts.title: Grow Your Own Crystal Nightlight
posts.content: Create some quaint ambient lighting while teaching your little ones about science with this grow your own crystal nightlight kit. It allows you to grow crystals in 8 alluring colors and comes with a STEM learning guide that teaches all about crystal formation.

posts.title: Solar Powered Lighter
posts.content: With the solar powered lighter you’ll be able to light up a cigarette no matter how windy or wet the environment may be. Instead of relying on gas lighters, this nifty tool harnesses the power of the sun to light your smoke while its reflective surface doubles as a mirror.

posts.title: Battle Gnome
posts.content: Add some variety to your plain garden with these garden battle gnomes that are pumped and ready for war. These garden battle gnomes are great for lawns, but also look swanky as your cubicle watch guard and make a great gift for the home.

posts.title: Sponge Gloves
posts.content: Clean your dirty dishes in record time by slipping your hands into these sponge gloves. These durable latex gloves not only keep your hands clean and dry but turn each of your fingers into a bendable sponge that allows you to effectively clean every dirty nook and cranny.

posts.title: GoSun Packable Solar Cooker
posts.content: Enjoy a nice hot meal – even if you’re in the middle of nowhere – by preparing it with the GoSun packable solar cooker. It comes fitted with a pair of compound-parabolic reflectors that heat up the cylindrical cooking space so that you can easily steam, bake, or roast your food.
